node.html:
• Architected and Developed highly interactive web applications for Entity Management using React/Redux.
  • Built and shipped Lambda Functions on serverless architecture.
  • Created a library which helps creating a form in declarative way.
  • Implemented Authentication in the backend server.
  • Implemented Role Based Access Control(RBAC) in the Graphql API.
  • Did Code Reviews, POCs

• Develop User Interface functionality for web applications, mobile apps using advanced UI technologies i.e React/ Angular.
  • Built RESTful API's Using Express.js
  • Implemented OAuth and JWT authentication in the Backend server.
  • Did Cassandra DB modeling and queries.
  • Helped team to implement Webpack in the codebase to setup smooth CI/CD.
